Like Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. John Lewis masterfully utilized the tactic of peaceful protest to combat injustice.

From his unique role in the March on Washington at the Lincoln Memorial in 1963 to serving his constituents in the House of Representatives for 33 years Congressman John Lewis fought for civil rights for African Americans throughout his entire life.
